description:
The fight against Byakuran is approaching, and yet Yamamoto is nonchalant as usual. Gokudera sees this and can’t hide his annoyance. However, Yamamoto seems to have a plan of his own. Everyone learns from the newspaper that there will be a district baseball competition at Namimori Middle School. According to Kusakabe, Namimori Middle School’s baseball team of this time period is too wild, and the team is on the verge of being discontinued. Yamamoto hears this and his expression turns gloomy. A short while later, Yamamoto disappears from the base. He is worried about the baseball team and has gone to the school. Gokudera is angry, but what exactly is Yamamoto’s intention…?
Source: crunchyroll
